Description: USA Custom Brian Moore MC/1 Gorgeous AAA Quilted Maple Top; w/RolandGR-20 Guitar Synth, long 13 pin cable, & original hard-shell case all inexcellent condition. This guitar is nearmint, and everything works as it should, including the GR-20 (with ownersmanual). Entire guitar is one solid bodywith graphite back and neck, and with ebony fret board. All solid adds a wider harmonic range and is very slimand lightweight. Neck has stayedperfectly straight for years; with very low action, and very fast. Also stays in tune, even when using whammybar a lot. Neck at nut just shy of1.75" 24 frets. 25.5" scale...With a five-way pickup selector, plus push/pull configuration through the tonecontrol. Both acoustic piezo andelectric pickups have separate volume controls, as well as a synth volumecontrol; and can run into the Roland synth via 13 pin cable; or the electricpicks can be via the 1/4" guitar out. The Piezo pickups are solely out 13-pin, useful for acoustic guitarmodeling. You can go out of the synthseparating guitar and synth sounds. Witha switch on the guitar can have just guitar or synth sounds or both output via13 pin. With volume pedal on the GR-20 you can also controleither to have more syth sounds volume or just guitar output. Another guitar switch allows you to changesynth programs and you can do this up or down with your customized bank ofsounds. Moreon the controls: Top knob is pickup volume, 2nd (blk) knob is Synthvolume, 3 way selector chooses Front, Both, Rear S-Ds, Top Toggle selectsSynth, Both, S-Ds; Lower Toggle runs Roland Synth unit patch selection or otheroptions you may program; 3rd Knob is Tone, Lift to split the S-Ds; 4th Knob isPiezo volume. Has Excellent Tuners, Bridge and Saddles. QuiltedMaple TopEbony Fretboard Wilkinson Bridge/whammy bar Sperzel locking tuners Roland GR-20 Manual: http://cms.rolandus.com/assets/media/pdf/gr20ws01.pdf
Title: Brian Moore Electric iGuitar 13 Pin RMC Piezo w/Roland GR-20 Synth & Case
